external_games.name: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution: Hi no Ataru Basho De

name: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution: Hi no Ataru Basho De
summary: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution: Hi no Ataru Basho De is a Role-Playing game, developed by PicPac-Airreal and published by Mubik, which was released in Japan in 2001.
